1587600.name: Broken Veil
1587600.description:
A short demo version of the game is now available to download. Note: this version of the demo is a playable alfa version and intended to show the general idea of what are we working on and not the final look of the game.
Thank you!

In the dark, behind the seal,
there are things most people try hard to conceal
So be very careful while you search about
Cause those things have their way of coming out

Have you prepared for things that are coming your way?





• Realistic scenery of the small Russian town, throughout the eyes of the little boy. Enjoy recognizable entourage of the era inspired by real places of the time.

• Cats are kids best friends! Felines are more than willing to help our hero solve puzzles. With a trusty laser pointer – a popular toy during the 90s, you can control their movements and make them go where you can not. Don’t forget to pet the kitty for their help!

• Travel from the great heights to the lowest crawls to reach his goal. Various locations filled with puzzles, obstacles, and dangers fitting for the surroundings. You will have to use wits, agility, and guts to finish this journey, and don't let your fears get the best of you!
